thread.title: Jennifer Lopez Talks Drake Rumors And Dating Younger Men On 'Ellen DeGeneres Show' (VIDEO)

title: Jennifer Lopez Talks Drake Rumors And Dating Younger Men On 'Ellen DeGeneres Show' (VIDEO)
text:
Jennifer Lopez Talks Drake Rumors And Dating Younger Men On 'Ellen DeGeneres Show' (VIDEO) posted by Holly Nicol - share 
Jennifer Lopez appears on Tuesday’s “Ellen DeGeneres Show,” where she discusses the topic of dating younger men and addresses the rumors surrounding her relationship with Drake . Check out the video above! 
During the interview, DeGeneres questions Lopez on her rumored romance with Drake. “He sent me a song he wanted me to be on. And then I got on the song, and yeah. We have a song together. I don’t know what he’s going to do with it,” Lopez notes. “We’re just hanging out,” she said, prompting DeGeneres to joke, “I hang out with a lot of friends, and we never hang out like that.” 
Lopez also discusses the topic of dating younger men, and explains how age is just a number. “I don’t date younger men, it’s not like you have to be younger. It’s not about that. I meet people and then if I go out with them, I go out with them, and if I like them, I like them, if I don’t, I don’t,” she notes.   "artist", "id" : 35549, "name" : "Jennifer Lopez" } } 
“I dated [Casper Smart] and he was younger. That was the first guy I dated younger than me and then I got labeled right away. It’s whether or not I’m attracted to them or not, attracted to their spirit their soul, whatever their energy is.” Check out the video below, in which Lopez also discusses the possibility of performing at next year’s Super Bowl halftime show.
